euInitiatives: As the leading organization in this specialized field, ICTJ has a unique role to play in providing EU policymakers with lessons learned from years of successes and failures in different countries and with results from our analysis and research. Specifically, ICTJ support and contribute to the implementation of the EU policy on transitional justice, both at policy and country level. ICTJ is also providing support to the EU in broader policy areas related human rights and democracy,  peacebuilding and conflict prevention, international cooperation and development. Currently, we are engaged in the discussions on the next EU AP on HR&D as well as on the next MFF.
